Interface SlashItemData

All Known Subinterfaces:
SlashItem
All Known Implementing Classes:
SlashItemDataImpl, SlashItemImpl
public interface SlashItemData
Interface for accessing Slash RSS module item data. Provides methods to get and set Slash-specific metadata including section, department, comments, and hit parade.
See Also:
  • Slash RSS Module Specification
